description.value: Character can spend a Full Action to make a Charge Movement Diretly at a Distant Enemy, as long as the Charge does not bring the character into melee range of another enemy, they can immeidately make a Full-Auto Burst Action with a Ranged Weapon as a Free Action, this has a +0 to the Ballistic Test instead of the normal -10.
